HediffDef.label: standard mechadendrite
HediffDef.description: An installed standard mechadendrite. Mini-servos combined with the biogel nerve-link grant the wielder excellent control and usability.

ThingDef.label: standard mechadendrite
ThingDef.description: A standard mechadendrite fabricated using modern techniques. The addition of mini-servos gives it impeccable movement while a flexible shell grants it exceptional flexibility. A biogel nerve-link wired into the wielder's spine allows for exquisite control and usability marking it the top of its class.

HediffDef.label: standard optical mechadendrite
HediffDef.description: An installed standard optical mechadendrite. Home to various visual sensors to aid in sight, it can see in spectrums normal fleshy eyes cannot while transmitting visual data to its wielder to improve sight.

ThingDef.label: standard optical mechadendrite
ThingDef.description: A standard optical mechadendrite hosts a suite of auxiliary sensors able to see in various spectrums of electromagnetic radiation. It's able to send visual information to its user without overloading the brain, but not much else.

HediffDef.label: standard engineer mechadendrite
HediffDef.description: An installed engineer mechadendrite. Its use of specialized tooling and connection to the wielder helps it aid in ways that could only be previously imagined.

ThingDef.label: standard engineer mechadendrite
ThingDef.description: Splitting itself off from the multitool mechadendrite, the standard engineer mechadendrite seeks to aid its wielder in fields relating to engineering work and mechanoids. Sacrificing tools previously used for more menial work, the engineer mechadendrite hosts a suite of tools designed in aiding the speed and efficiency an engineer can work at. By connecting into the user's spine, it can act semi-autonomously allowing for crude true multitasking.

HediffDef.label: standard drill mechadendrite
HediffDef.description: A standard drill mechadendrite. With a drill at the tip of it and a tough plasteel exterior, it can make short of any mining job given to it.

ThingDef.label: standard drill mechadendrite
ThingDef.description: Created by putting a small drill on its tip, the drill can be controlled consciously by its user or used subconsciously to improve mining efforts. A tough plasteel exterior gives it much needed protection while performing mining operations with reinforced shielding within protects its delicate circuitry.

HediffDef.label: standard artisan mechadendrite
HediffDef.description: An installed standard artisan mechadendrite. Embedded with advanced tools, it's able to aid its user in many artisan fields of work.

ThingDef.label: standard artisan mechadendrite
ThingDef.description: Based on the refined multitool mechadendrite, the standard artisan mechadendrite has been optimized to assist in artistic and menial fields of work. Embedded with advanced tools, the artisan mechadendrite is a master at both menial and artistic works.
